events.message: I recently purchased a product from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it did not meet my expectations and I am unsatisfied with the quality.
The customer issue has been reviewed and classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and respond to the customer's concerns promptly.
